blindme.command.effect_already_set: This is the currently active effect
blindme.options.title: BlindMe Settings
blindme.options.swing_hand_on_touch.tool: Some servers have aggressive anti-cheats, and the hand swinging animation can cause issues.
blindme.options.current_world_effect: Effect for the current world / server: %s
blindme.options.current_world_effect.too: Blindness: Blocks and entities are only visible in a small radius
Darkness: Blocks and entities are visible in a medium radius
blindme.options.disable_darkness_pulse: Disable the pulsing effect from Darkness
blindme.options.disable_darkness_pulse.t: Removes the pulsing effect from Darkness when it's applied by BlindMe
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.blindme: A client-sided mod that enforces the Blindness effect on the player, configurable per world.
